Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the availability of agency records prior to or at an open meeting
Summary: Relates to the availability of agency records prior to or at an open meeting; removes the "to the extent practicable as determined by the agency or the department" limitation from the requirement that agencies and departments shall make records available.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the availability of agency records prior to or at an open meeting
